text: North Korea's leader has made a second
surprise visit to China Beijing has
confirmed that Kim jong-un met President
Xi Jinping in North Dalian city for two
days of talks it comes ahead of a
regional meeting on Wednesday between
China South Korea and Japan
denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula
is on the agenda Kim is trying to shore
up support with his ally China ahead of
a historic summit with US president
which could happen by the end of the
month or law Rebecca is live from Seoul
for us with the latest Nora what more do
we know about this meeting well it was a

in Delhi on his sister it was there as

jong-un took power in 2011 and since
then he hadn't left his country until

any summit any plan summit with

to try to get its economy moving again
after those international sanctions it
will need president ji on side China for

both want the same thing they want
